name: OROBOOST®
description: OROBOOST® is an organic adjuvant, formulated specifically to make organic herbicides, insecticides, miticides, fungicides and foliar nutrients work harder. In addition to improving spreading, wetting and penetration, OROBOOST is the only organic adjuvant with proprietary TransPhloem™ technology that accelerates input translocation throughout plants, including roots, to deliver active ingredients for quicker and better results.
